message: I propose a fair deal where you get 10% and I get 90% - it's a win-win!
I'll take a slightly more generous offer this time, but I'm not giving away all the money!
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make it worthwhile.  This offer is fair, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give you all the power in this negotiation
